Title: Three Monkeys
Writer: Philip K. Dick (based on the book by), Frank Spotnitz (developed by), Rob Williams
Actors: Alexa Davalos, Rupert Evans, Luke Kleintank, DJ Qualls
Plot: Joe celebrates VA day at Smith's house. Juliana accepts a job working for Tagomi as she continues her search for answers. Smith invites an old friend to join the celebrations with surprising results.
